about_the_game:
Atompunks 1969

Atomopia was one of the largest cities. In 1969, its population was large. Its skyline is more impressive than that of other large cities; its metropolis was spread over such vast plains that the buildings could be seen for miles. It was a city full of atomic powered cars, fog, and stubborn atompunks. Its people are such a vivid mixture of races, languages, and colors that they seemed to shine in the lights of the city. The streets were teeming with people on their way to work. As clusters of people walked by, their pace would slow, their stride would lengthen and their eyes would widen, following the shadows cast by the atombots.

Life outside the walls of atomopia was much more brutal, as many struggled to survive. The people of the Wastelands were desperate for access to the advanced sparks, but the pieces of equipment could only be obtained by the wealthiest of the population. The city members attempted to reign in their rebellious nature and ease their pain by constructing a plan. This was geared towards controlling those who resisted their power and the starship factory. An essential part of this plan was they supplied basic foodstuffs to the people. The atombots kept a close eye on these people. Some did not have the strength to fight against them, but they still had courage. The starship factory was not interested in the issue of the safety of the streets, which are the living space of the public. These people became the main resisters against them, their clothes in tatters and feet bare on the bumpy road of life.

The powerful and wealthy starship factory was working on a new machine called atomflux, which were parts that could connect with the humans to give people superhuman strength and intelligence. But before the public event, they needed to test it on many people.

This is how the battle between the starship factory and the atompunks began.

The tubes and sparks that formed the lifeblood of atomopia now seemed completely worthless, it was a playground for their minds and was spreading fast.

They returned to the wastelands, now dominated by atombots, with a new purpose, to protect their people from the starship factory.

Here are some of the features and content You can expect from this challenging game . . .

Single Player OR Multiplayer {PvP OR CO-OP}

Go on Quests given to You by Friendbots ALL over the City.

Collect Sparks to Reach Your Goal.

Race against other players to see who can get ALL the sparks first.

Drive Atomic Cars.

Fun RPG style Gameplay for a Single Player OR Play with Your Friends via Steam Online Sub-System

Fight Atomic Powered Zombiebots and Gunbots across the Atompunk inspired game map

You can also try the Following Challenges . . .

"Easter Egg" Challenge - How many other Archor Games Logos Appear in the Game ?

"Speed Run" Challenge - What is the Fastest Time You can complete the game ?

"Scenic" Pictures Challenge - Take Screenshots of the Beautiful City and share them on Social Media with Your Friends.

"Walkthrough" Challenge - Post a video of a Complete 'Walkthrough' of the entire Game.

Walk Don't Run Challenge - Only Walk for the Entire Game.

"Steamy Streamer" Challenge - Get ALL of the Archor Games products available on Steam and Stream ALL of them Beginning to End.

... and more!

* This game is part of the "Punks" mini-series event from Archor Games, be sure to check it out on Steam! *

name: Atompunks 1969
short_description: Atompunks 1969 - You and Your friends must battle the starship factory and evil atombots for control of atomopia. (Single Player OR Multiplayer {PvP OR CO-OP})
